title.en: I Drew A Magical Girl Comic ⭐︎

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女の漫画描いたよ⭐︎

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahou Shoujo no Manga Egaita yo ⭐︎

description.en: Hoshizora Riaru has always dreamt of becoming a magical girl.

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** 泉朝樹

He met his wife, [Izumi Emo](https://mangadex.org/author/c1c63cf4-f44c-429c-986a-c052d89df536), in high school. They have 3 children together.

At 18 years old, in January 2004, he was a finalist and won an honorable mention from the 10th Jump Twelve Newcomer Comic Awards with “CLEANER”. He then debuted in December 2006 with “Psychokinesis” in *Go! Go! Jump*.

Former assistant of [Masuda Tsuyoshi](https://mangadex.org/author/605a4425-881b-4fd0-97f3-1e85636fae15). Friends with [Katayama Yousuke](https://mangadex.org/author/5882f4df-26a0-4cd5-90f5-b01f7007246c) and [Oshikiri Rensuke](https://mangadex.org/author/9fbe9050-d5c2-48fe-8154-6ebe032de6c4).

Often streams his drawing on YouTube.

**Additional Sites:**
- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/izumi000i/)
- [Threads](https://www.threads.net/@izumi000i)
- [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/tomokiizumi.bsky.social)
